name: The EDWARD A. SHERMAN PUBLISHING COMPANY et al. v. William R. GOLDBERG
name_abbreviation: Edward a. Sherman Publishing Co. v. Goldberg

parties: The EDWARD A. SHERMAN PUBLISHING COMPANY et al. v. William R. GOLDBERG.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted. The motion of David Boggs and Elizabeth Boggs to intervene in this matter is hereby granted.

attorneys: Sheffield & Harvey, W. Ward Harvey, G. Quentin Anthony, Jr., Newport, for petitioners.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Corcor-an, Peckham & Hayes, Kathleen Managhan, Newport, for intervenors.
casebody.head_matter:
The EDWARD A. SHERMAN PUBLISHING COMPANY et al. v. William R. GOLDBERG.
No. 80-543-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Jan. 22, 1981.
Sheffield & Harvey, W. Ward Harvey, G. Quentin Anthony, Jr., Newport, for petitioners.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Corcor-an, Peckham & Hayes, Kathleen Managhan, Newport, for intervenors.
